0.text:
Innate: Aurelion Sol's damaging abilities against enemies grant him stacks of Stardust, which improve each of his abilities. The amount of Stardust collected by each ability may vary by target.
 Breath of Light: Bursts deal bonus magic damage equal to (0.031% Stardust stacks) of the target's maximum health.
 Astral Flight: Range is increased by 62.5% Stardust stacks.
 Singularity: Outer and inner radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks, and execution threshold increased by 2.6% Stardust stacks.
 Falling Star and  The Skies Descend: Effect radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks.
0.html:
Innate: Aurelion Sol's damaging abilities against enemies grant him stacks of Stardust, which improve each of his abilities. The amount of Stardust collected by each ability may vary by target.

  • Breath of Light: Bursts deal bonus magic damage equal to (0.031% Stardust stacks) of the target's maximum health.
  • Astral Flight: Range is increased by 62.5% Stardust stacks.
  • Singularity: Outer and inner radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks, and execution threshold increased by 2.6% Stardust stacks.
  • Falling Star and The Skies Descend: Effect radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks.
markedPassages: Breath of Light
Astral Flight
Singularity
Falling Star
The Skies Descend

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol  charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit,  reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit, reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.
markedPassages: charges
reveals

1.text: Breath of Light can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.
1.html: Breath of Light can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.

2.text: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal  bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a  champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against  monsters.
2.html: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against monsters.

0.content: 20 − 40 (based on level) (+ 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80) (+ 40% AP) (+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health

markedPassages: champion
monsters
(+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health
(+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health

3.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Breath of Light early.

4.text: At rank 5, Breath of Light's channel duration lasts for as long as Aurelion Sol can pay its mana cost.
4.html: At rank 5, Breath of Light's channel duration lasts for as long as Aurelion Sol can pay its mana cost.

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol  dashes in the target direction and resets  Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and  Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol dashes in the target direction and resets Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has unobstructed vision and Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.

0.marker: BREATH OF LIGHT FLAT DAMAGE MODIFIER:

markedPassages: dashes
Breath of Light's
cooldown
unobstructed vision
Breath of Light
Breath of Light

1.text: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
1.html: Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

2.text: Astral Flight can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the dash, and does so automatically after reaching the destination.
2.html: Astral Flight can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the dash, and does so automatically after reaching the destination.

3.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Astral Flight early.

4.text: Scoring a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces Astral Flight's  current cooldown by 90% of its total cooldown.
4.html: Scoring a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces Astral Flight's  current cooldown by 90% of its total cooldown.
markedPassages: takedown
current cooldown

5.text: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.  Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or  Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
5.html: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is immobilized or grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: immobilized
grounded
Breath of Light's
Singularity
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.  Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or  Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

4.text:
EFFECT RADIUS:  √(275² + 16.93²  ×  STARDUST) / √(137.5² + 8.46²  ×  STARDUST)
 √(275² + 16.93²  ×  STARDUST) / √(137.5² + 8.46²  ×  STARDUST)

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol blasts the target location, conjuring a black hole after a 0.5-second delay that lasts for 5 seconds, grants  sight of the area, and deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within the area.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol blasts the target location, conjuring a black hole after a 0.5-second delay that lasts for 5 seconds, grants sight of the area, and deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within the area.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Enemies in the black hole are  dragged toward its center over the duration. Non-epic monster targets within the center that are below 5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health are also  executed. Additionally, non-champions affected have their movement speed reduced to 0.
1.html: Enemies in the black hole are dragged toward its center over the duration. Non-epic monster targets within the center that are below 5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health are also executed. Additionally, non-champions affected have their movement speed reduced to 0.
markedPassages: dragged
5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health
5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health
executed

2.text:
After Singularity ends, Aurelion Sol is granted 1 Stardust for each continuous second that enemy champions were inside it, and a varying amount of Stardust for enemies that died while within the area:
Champions and epic monsters grant 5 Stardust.
Large minions and monsters grant 3 Stardust.
Small minions and monsters grant 1 Stardust.
2.html:
After Singularity ends, Aurelion Sol is granted 1 Stardust for each continuous second that enemy champions were inside it, and a varying amount of Stardust for enemies that died while within the area:

  • Champions and epic monsters grant 5 Stardust.
  • Large minions and monsters grant 3 Stardust.
  • Small minions and monsters grant 1 Stardust.

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.
markedPassages: stunning

1.text: Once Falling Star has been learned, gathering 75 Stardust causes the next cast of Falling Star to transform into  The Skies Descend instead, empowering the impact with new effects.
1.html: Once Falling Star has been learned, gathering 75 Stardust causes the next cast of Falling Star to transform into The Skies Descend instead, empowering the impact with new effects.
markedPassages: The Skies Descend

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing  25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and  knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing 25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: knocking up

1.text: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing  magic damage to enemy champions and epic  monsters hit, and  slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and  revealing them for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemy champions and epic monsters hit, and slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and revealing them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: monsters
slowing
revealing

textContent.text: Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities.
textContent.html: Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities.

textContent.text: Each Star deals 12 − 120 (based on level) (+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on  Celestial Expansion's Rank) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy  minions that have less than  25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
textContent.html: Each Star deals 12 − 120 (based on level) (+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on Celestial Expansion's Rank) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy minions that have less than  25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol fires a star in the target direction that expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit, granting him  20% bonus movement speed while active. If he moves faster than the star, the speed of the star will increase to stay within the Outer Limit.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol fires a star in the target direction that expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit, granting him  20% bonus movement speed while active. If he moves faster than the star, the speed of the star will increase to stay within the Outer Limit.

textContent.text: Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the star is active, and does so automatically when the star travels beyond the Outer Limit.
textContent.html: Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the star is active, and does so automatically when the star travels beyond the Outer Limit.

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).
Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).
Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).

textContent.text: Passive:  Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.
textContent.html: Passive: Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.

skillTabs.concerningText: Passive:  Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his  Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his  Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.

textContent.text: Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting  Comet of Legend.
textContent.html: Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting Comet of Legend.

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
textContent.html: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

concerningSkills.skillName: celestial expansion's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and takes flight,  dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his Stars and takes flight, dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and takes flight,  dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.

textContent.text: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
textContent.html: Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

concerningSkills.skillName: aurelion sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

textContent.text: Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy  champions or  turrets.
textContent.html: Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy champions or turrets.

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.

textContent.text: Taking champion or turret damage while Comet of Legend is not active places it on a 4-second  static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be  revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.
textContent.html: Taking champion or turret damage while Comet of Legend is not active places it on a 4-second  static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.

textContent.text: Starsurge can be used during the dash.
textContent.html: Starsurge can be used during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Starsurge can be used during the dash.

concerningSkills.skillName: starsurge can be used during the dash.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path,  slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit,  stunning them for 0.125 seconds and  knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path, slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit, stunning them for 0.125 seconds and knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.

textContent.text: Aurelion Sol  channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be  interrupted by any  crowd control.

textContent.text: Passive:  Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.
textContent.html: Passive: Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.

skillTabs.concerningText: Passive:  Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his  Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his  Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.

textContent.text: Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting  Comet of Legend.
textContent.html: Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting Comet of Legend.

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
textContent.html: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

concerningSkills.skillName: celestial expansion's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and takes flight,  dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his Stars and takes flight, dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and takes flight,  dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.

textContent.text: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
textContent.html: Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

concerningSkills.skillName: aurelion sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

textContent.text: Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy  champions or  turrets.
textContent.html: Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy champions or turrets.

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.

textContent.text: Taking champion or turret damage while Comet of Legend is not active places it on a 4-second  static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be  revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.
textContent.html: Taking champion or turret damage while Comet of Legend is not active places it on a 4-second  static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.

textContent.text: Starsurge can be used during the dash.
textContent.html: Starsurge can be used during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Starsurge can be used during the dash.

concerningSkills.skillName: starsurge can be used during the dash.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path,  slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit,  stunning them for 0.125 seconds and  knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path, slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit, stunning them for 0.125 seconds and knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path,  slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit,  stunning them for 0.125 seconds and  knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.

Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path,  slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit,  stunning them for 0.125 seconds and  knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.

textContent.text: Aurelion Sol  channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be  interrupted by any  crowd control.
textContent.html: Aurelion Sol channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be interrupted by any crowd control.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol  channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be  interrupted by any  crowd control.

concerningSkills.skillName: aurelion sol channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. voice of light cannot be interrupted by any crowd control.

textContent.text: Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.
textContent.html: Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.

concerningSkills.skillName: celestial expansion can be cast during voice of light.
